title: 5G to be key enabler of client spends for Tech Mahindra in FY23 - Economic Times
content:
1. 5G to be key enabler of client spends for Tech Mahindra in FY23  Economic Times
  2. After committing $955 million on buys, Tech Mahindra to focus on integrating companies  Moneycontrol
  3. After pledging $955 mn on buys, Tech Mahindra to focus on integrating firms  Business Standard
  4. Tech Mahindra To Focus On Integrating Companies  NDTV Profit
  5. Tech Mahindra Q4 consolidated net profit rises 12% to Rs 1545.3 crore  The Financial Express
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Indias fifth largest IT company, which acquired eight companies in FY22 for around $940 million, said it will go less aggressive and on the mergers and acquisitions front this year as it will concentrate on integration and reaping synergies from these targeted companies apart from organic growth.
